# The Almond Yield Equation from Lobell et al. 2006

$$
Y = -0.015T_{n,2} - 0.0046T^{2}_{n,2} - 0.07P_{1} + 0.0043P^{2}_{1} + 0.28
$$

```{r libraries}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

```{r data}
clim_data <- read_delim(file = "clim.txt", delim = " ") %>% 
  group_by(year, month) %>%
  summarise(T = min(tmin_c),
            P = sum(precip))

T <- clim_data %>% 
  filter(month == 2) %>% 
  select(year, T)

P <- clim_data %>%
  filter(month == 1) %>% 
  select(year, P)
```

```{r source function}
source(here("R", "almond-yield.R"))

```
